title: Eye Bone
summaries: The Eye Bone is a pet-summoning item which has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from Deerclops. When used, it summons a mobile Piggy Bank named Chester. Chester is essentially an upgrade to the Money Trough; not requiring to be re-summoned every time the player wants to access their Piggy Bank.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a living chest to store your items
'It's looking into my soul.'
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
